src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : Um hello , okay , I think we need to find the rheumatology ward . # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( rheumatology_ward ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( rheumatology_ward ) ) RP : Yes , I think that 's it . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Ok , he told us to go to the building behind us , it 's the second door on the left . He 's giving us directions . That 's handy . There you go . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] LC : What time was our appointment ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : So we have an appointment at 10.30 PM . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : It 's 10 PM just now so we have plenty of time . LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : We have time . LC : We 'll walk slowly . RP : We 'll walk slowly . LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : There 's no need to worry . RP : Ok , there you go , we 're in the ward . src: [start] LC : Well , the treatment was , well the appointment was very quick . I 'd love a coffee now . Do you know where I could get one ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Um hello , we 'd like a coffee . Can you please tell us where to go to get a coffee ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Ok , well thank you very much . [MASK] [MASK] LC : So we 'll take the lift back down , is that right ? src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RC : Hello ARI . [MASK] LP : I need to go to room 17 for treatment . So , I do n't know how to get to room 17 . [MASK] [MASK] RC : ARI , could you please tell us how to get to room 17 ? For a ... [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . You continue along the building , take the lift and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Ok. And is it on the left or the right ... on the second floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . [MASK] RC : Ok . The reception is on the ground floor , is that right ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . Absolutely . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Are we , are we expected in room 17 ? Is there someone who will see us or guide us ? RC : Yes , do you know if there is someone who will come and welcome us to room 17 ? And what paperwork do we need to provide ? ARI : I 'll call a nurse to find out . Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] RC : Ok , thank you , I 'll wait for you to call the nurse then . [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RC : Can I sit somewhere with my husband while I wait ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] [MASK] LP : I have an appointment at 12.30 PM , is it going ahead ? I 'm not late or too early ? RC : Um , we have ... [MASK] [end] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( ) RC : I 'm the one you have to talk to because if not ... LP : I have an appointment at 12.30 PM . Will there be any delay ? ARI : No . # disaffirm ( ) RC : Because we have another appointment later in another department . ARI : Yes . Have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

[MASK] [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] RP : But what if I have an appointment in the morning ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So we do n't eat , we are n't offered breakfast ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Well , thanks anyway . [MASK] ARI : Thank you very much . [MASK] LC : Can you tell me where room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Oh , but I do n't know . RP : Is room 17 on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Where is room 17 ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Normally , I have an appointment . RP : I have an appointment in room 17 . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So , where do the appointments take place ? Where are the appointments ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Do you have another number for me ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Okay well , thank you then . [MASK] LC : The appointment was scheduled for four o'clock .
